alert.note: Alert for Broome; Cortland; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 9:57PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHENANGO...CORTLAND... TIOGA...AND BROOME COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 956 PM EDT, a band of heavy snow was near Nanticoke, or 9 miles southwest of Marathon moving east at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Nanticoke, Coventry, Greene, Berkshire, Richford, Newark Valley, Whitney Point, Lisle, South Oxford and Chenango Forks. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 7 and 8. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
